类 Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The main body of the Game, including the whole information in a game such as number of player, state of the player, and category that chosen
    作者:
    Lirui Jin

      • nextRound

        Begin next round according to next round

      • setComputerChoice

        public void setComputerChoice()
        Set computer choice if current player is computer

      • checkRoundResult

        private void checkRoundResult()
        Helper method for nextRound(), add every player's top of card into temp list(Nondestructive way). Compare the value of chosen category and get the winner. Then remove cards of everyone's top(Destructive method) and put cards in temp list to the winner player's card won list. Next, clear the temp list and set winner as player playing next round, set isDraw flag to false. If draw，remain temp list and currentPlayer, set isDraw flag to true

      • addCardToTemp

        private void addCardToTemp()
        Add the top card of each player who still has a hand left(Nondestructive method)

      • isTerminated

        private boolean isTerminated()
        check whether is terminated
        返回:
        player has card left

      • getFinalWinner

        public Player getFinalWinner()
        Return a final winner, if does not has, return null
        返回:
        the final winner
